column1: #text=Every Saturday I do a chore I actually really enjoy - grocery shopping !
#text=This past Saturday was no exception , so I began to plan my outing .
#text=I always begin by surveying my refrigerator and cabinets .
#text=What food do I already have and what do I need ?
#text=There are certain basic things I get almost every week .
#text=At this point I begin to make a written list to bring with .
#text=This week I also had a birthday party to shop for so extras like cake mix and a can of frosting went on my list .
#text=Once the list was done I headed to the store .
#text=It 's a short drive , and once there I grabbed a cart and begin to head down the aisles .
#text=After that on to dairy and dried goods , and even cleaning products .
#text=Finally it was off to the frozen aisles , I needed to get ice cream for the party !
#text=With a full cart I went to the cash register , loaded all the food on the convener belt , and then paid for the groceries as a boy bagged everything .
